channel.title: How to change start lwls up to 3..reply pls
channel.description: each time some1 register to my server and starts to play he have all lwls up to 99..so i can turn it off and set starts lwl 3..thanks

item.title: How to change start lwls up to 3..reply pls
item.dc:creator: @Joachim2k1k Joachim2k1k
item.description:
@Joachim2k1k wrote:

go player.java

search for:

//Setting Levels

if u want to start with 99 hp u do
it shal look like this

            for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 99;
			playerXP[i] = 14000000;

Read full topic
